sourcesContent:
import { Component, HostListener, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { private header!: HTMLElement; ngOnInit() { this.header = document.querySelector('.header') as HTMLElement; } @HostListener('window:scroll', []) onWindowScroll() { const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.section'); const headerHeight = this.header.offsetHeight; // Hide header when scrolled past its height if (window.scrollY > headerHeight) { this.header.style.display = 'none'; } else { this.header.style.display = 'flex'; } // Reveal sections smoothly as they enter the viewport sections.forEach((section) => { const sectionTop = section.getBoundingClientRect().top; const windowHeight = window.innerHeight; if (sectionTop < windowHeight - 100) { section.classList.add('visible'); } }); } }
